content: knit from the top down with raglan shaping this is the perfect easy fit poncho for babies on the go worked in the round with no sleeves to pick up and knit this is a cute and quick project to make with minimal finishing knit using bernat baby velvet it is perfect for layering over clothes for springtime playdates materials size u s 6 4 mm circular knitting needles 16 40 5 cm and 24 61 cm long or size needed to obtain gauge size u s 7 4 5 mm circular knitting needles 16 40 5 cm and 24 61 cm long or size needed to obtain gauge 8 stitch markers tapestry needle sizing finished chest 6 mos 20 51 cm 12 mos 21 53 5 cm 18 mos 22 56 cm 24 mos 23 58 5 cm
